      • Tower

        public Tower(int xPixels,
             int yPixels)
        Initialises the tower by setting initial values and loading the basic tower image.
        Parameters:
        xPixels - the x position of the tower in the window in pixels.
        yPixels - the y position of the tower in the window in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • setInitialProperties

        public static void setInitialProperties(float iDamage,
                                        float iRange,
                                        float iSpeed,
                                        float towerBuildCost)
        Set initial values for all future towers.
        Parameters:
        iDamage - the initial damage the tower's fireballs inflict.
        iRange - the initial maximum distance from which the tower can shoot fireballs.
        iSpeed - the initial rate at which the tower shoots fireballs.
        towerBuildCost - the initial cost of building a tower.

        The X position of the tower in pixels.
        Returns:

        The Y position of the tower in pixels.
        Returns:
        int of pixels downard.

      • createFireball

        public void createFireball(Fireball newFireball)
        If the tower does not currently have a Fireball, a new Fireball will be added to attack monsters.
        Parameters:
        newFireball - the next fireball this tower will use to attack.
